name: Hackerman (Boxfriend)
description:
Hackerman is a short game made for N8Jam. The theme of the jam was "break the system" hence the hacking theme. 

At it's core, hackerman is a simple platformer. However you may find that what the game tells you isn't always what you need to do.

This game is a prototype. It may or may not get new content in the future.

Asset Attributions:
